component.text: PC1 sends a broadcast to switch S2.
Switch S2 forwards the broadcast out all switch ports, except the originating port and the port associated with Trunk2.
Switch S1 forwards the broadcast out all ports, except the originating port. Switch S3 receives the frame but does not continue to forward it back to switch S2 due to the blocked port.
PC1 sends a broadcast to switch S2.
Switch S2 forwards the broadcast out all switch ports, except the originating port and the port associated with Trunk2.
Switch S1 forwards the broadcast out all ports, except the originating port. Switch S3 receives the frame but does not continue to forward it back to switch S2 due to the blocked port.
PC1 sends a broadcast frame to switch S2. The trunk link between switch S2 and switch S1 has failed.
Switch S3 unblocks the port for Trunk2 and switch S2 blocks the port for Trunk1. Switch S2 forwards the broadcast out all switch ports, except the originating port and the failed link for Trunk1.
Switch S3 forwards the broadcast out all available switch ports, except the originating port.
Switch S1 forwards the broadcast out all available switch ports, except the originating port and the port for Trunk1 since it is not available while the link is down.
